item.title: Solve Unexpected end of JSON input while parsing near... on NPM install
item.description: Yesterday when my internet really slow, I keep failed on installing npm package. The error shows npm ERR! Unexpected end of JSON input while parsing near …..' npm cache clean --force So when the internet back at the speed again, I just clean the npm cache, then reinstall the package I want
